class:
Shaman
Reduces the mana cost of your Elemental spells by 2%. Reduces the mana cost of your Elemental spells by 4%. Reduces the mana cost of your Elemental spells by 6%. Reduces the mana cost of your Elemental spells by 8%. Reduces the mana cost of your Elemental spells by 10%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Shock spells by 1%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Shock spells by 2%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Shock spells by 3%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Shock spells by 4%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Shock spells by 5%.
Increases the health of your Stoneclaw Totem by 25% and gives your Earthbind Totem pulses a 5% chance to root enemies for 2 secs. Increases the health of your Stoneclaw Totem by 50% and gives your Earthbind Totem pulses a 10% chance to root enemies for 2 secs.
Increases the damage caused by your Fire Totems, Flametongue Weapon and Flame Shock spell by 5% and reduces the delay before your Fire Nova Totem activates by 1 sec. Increases the damage caused by your Fire Totems, Flametongue Weapon and Flame Shock spell by 10% and reduces the delay before your Fire Nova Totem activates by 1.5 sec. Increases the damage caused by your Fire Totems, Flametongue Weapon and Flame Shock spell by 15% and reduces the delay before your Fire Nova Totem activates by 2 sec.
Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by 5% and reduces the threat generated by your Elemental spells by 10%. Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by 10% and reduces the threat generated by your Elemental spells by 20%.
Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with melee attacks by 3% for 10 sec. Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with melee attacks by 6% for 10 sec. Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with melee attacks by 9% for 10 sec.
Gives you a 10% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after casting any Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by an additional 1%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by an additional 2%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by an additional 3%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by an additional 4%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by an additional 5%.
Gives you a 50% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 6 sec after being the victim of a melee or ranged critical strike. The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage. Gives you a 100% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 6 sec after being the victim of a melee or ranged critical strike. The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 2%. Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 4%. Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 6%. Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 8%. Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 10%.
Increases your chance to hit with Fire, Frost and Nature spells by 1%. Increases your chance to hit with Fire, Frost and Nature spells by 2%. Increases your chance to hit with Fire, Frost and Nature spells by 3%. Increases your chance to hit with Fire, Frost and Nature spells by 4%. Increases your chance to hit with Fire, Frost and Nature spells by 5%.
Gives your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells a 10% chance to increase the Fire, Frost, and Nature damage the target takes by 10% for 6 secs. Gives your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells a 20% chance to increase the Fire, Frost, and Nature damage the target takes by 10% for 6 secs. Gives your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells a 30% chance to increase the Fire, Frost, and Nature damage the target takes by 10% for 6 secs.
Gives your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells a 20% chance to cast a second, similar spell on the same target at no additional cost that causes half damage.
Increases the range of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 3 yards. Increases the range of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 6 yards.
Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 0.2 sec. Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 0.4 sec. Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 0.6 sec. Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 0.8 sec. Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 1 sec.
When activated, this spell gives your next Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell a 100% critical strike chance and reduces the mana cost by 100%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 1%. Increases your maximum Mana by 2%. Increases your maximum Mana by 3%. Increases your maximum Mana by 4%. Increases your maximum Mana by 5%.
Increases your Agility and chance to dodge by 1%. Increases your Agility and chance to dodge by 2%. Increases your Agility and chance to dodge by 3%. Increases your Agility and chance to dodge by 4%. Increases your Agility and chance to dodge by 5%.
Gives your Lightning Shield spell a 10% chance to restore 1% of your total mana after you cast lightning or Shock spells. Gives your Lightning Shield spell a 10% chance to restore 2% of your total mana after you cast lightning or Shock spells. Gives your Lightning Shield spell a 10% chance to restore 3% of your total mana after you cast lightning or Shock spells.
Increases your attack speed by 10% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike. Increases your attack speed by 20% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike. Increases your attack speed by 30% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.
Increases the amount of damage reduced by your Stoneskin Totem by 10% and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by 1 sec. Increases the amount of damage reduced by your Stoneskin Totem by 20% and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by 2 sec.
Increases the effect of your Strength of Earth and Grace of Air Totems by 8%. Increases the effect of your Strength of Earth and Grace of Air Totems by 15%.
Reduces the cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by 1.5 sec. Reduces the cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by 3 sec.
Increases your total stats by 1%, and reduces damage taken from critical strikes by 1% for every active Totem. Increases your total stats by 2%, and reduces damage taken from critical strikes by 2% for every active Totem. Increases your total stats by 3%, and reduces damage taken from critical strikes by 3% for every active Totem. Increases your total stats by 4%, and reduces damage taken from critical strikes by 4% for every active Totem. Increases your total stats by 5%, and reduces damage taken from critical strikes by 5% for every active Totem.
Allows you to use Two-Handed Axes and Two-Handed Maces.
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by 1%. Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by 2%. Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by 3%. Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by 4%. Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by 5%.
Increases your chance to hit and the damage you deal with melee weapons by 1%. Increases your chance to hit and the damage you deal with melee weapons by 2%. Increases your chance to hit and the damage you deal with melee weapons by 3%. Increases your chance to hit and the damage you deal with melee weapons by 4%. Increases your chance to hit and the damage you deal with melee weapons by 5%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Windfury Totem by 15% and increases the damage caused by your Flametongue Totem by 6%. Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Windfury Totem by 30% and increases the damage caused by your Flametongue Totem by 12%.
Increases your melee critical strike chance with Rockbiter Weapon by 3%, the melee attack power bonus of your Windfury Weapon effect by 14%, and the damage caused by your Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon by 5%. Increases your melee critical strike chance with Rockbiter Weapon by 5%, the melee attack power bonus of your Windfury Weapon effect by 27%, and the damage caused by your Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon by 10%. Increases your melee critical strike chance with Rockbiter Weapon by 7%, the melee attack power bonus of your Windfury Weapon effect by 40%, and the damage caused by your Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon by 15%.
Gives a chance to parry enemy melee attacks and transfers 10% of the threat you generate to the enemy target's target.
Your melee attacks with Rockbiter Weapon, Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon, and extra attacks from Windfury Weapon, grant you Static Charge. Lasts 20 secs. and stacks up to 6 times. Static Charge causes your next Shock or Stormstrike spell to restore mana equal to 1% of the damage done. Your melee attacks with Rockbiter Weapon, Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon, and extra attacks from Windfury Weapon, grant you Static Charge. Lasts 20 secs. and stacks up to 6 times. Static Charge causes your next Shock or Stormstrike spell to restore mana equal to 2% of the damage done. Your melee attacks with Rockbiter Weapon, Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon, and extra attacks from Windfury Weapon, grant you Static Charge. Lasts 20 secs. and stacks up to 6 times. Static Charge causes your next Shock or Stormstrike spell to restore mana equal to 3% of the damage done. Your melee attacks with Rockbiter Weapon, Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon, and extra attacks from Windfury Weapon, grant you Static Charge. Lasts 20 secs. and stacks up to 6 times. Static Charge causes your next Shock or Stormstrike spell to restore mana equal to 4% of the damage done. Your melee attacks with Rockbiter Weapon, Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon, and extra attacks from Windfury Weapon, grant you Static Charge. Lasts 20 secs. and stacks up to 6 times. Static Charge causes your next Shock or Stormstrike spell to restore mana equal to 5% of the damage done.
Gives you an extra attack. In addition, the next 2 sources of Nature damage dealt to the target are increased by 20%. Lasts 12 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.1 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.2 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.3 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.4 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.5 sec.
Reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 1%. Reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 2%. Reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 3%. Reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 4%. Reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 5%.
Reduces the cooldown of all your spells by 5%. Reduces the cooldown of all your spells by 10%.
Gives your healing spells a 10% chance to increase your target's stats by 10% for 15 secs. Gives your healing spells a 15% chance to increase your target's stats by 10% for 15 secs. Gives your healing spells a 20% chance to increase your target's stats by 10% for 15 secs.
Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by 5%. Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by 10%. Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by 15%. Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by 20%. Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by 25%.
Gives you a 20% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell and increases the healing done by your Healing Wave spell by 2%. Gives you a 40% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell and increases the healing done by your Healing Wave spell by 4%. Gives you a 60% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell and increases the healing done by your Healing Wave spell by 6%.
Gives you a 20% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell and reduces the threat generated by your healing spells by 10%. Gives you a 40% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell and reduces the threat generated by your healing spells by 20%.
Channel the purifiying power of water, removing 1 curse effect from yourself. Requires a Water Totem to be active, consuming it on cast.
Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by 1%. Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by 2%. Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by 3%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by 1% and restores mana equal to 20% of your level every 5 seconds. Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by 2% and restores mana equal to 40% of your level every 5 seconds. Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by 3% and restores mana equal to 60% of your level every 5 seconds.
Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 5%. Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 10%. Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 15%. Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 20%. Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 25%.
Your Healing Wave spells have a 33% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by 6% for 15 sec. This effect will stack up to 3 times. Your Healing Wave spells have a 66% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by 6% for 15 sec. This effect will stack up to 3 times. Your Healing Wave spells have a 100% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by 6% for 15 sec. This effect will stack up to 3 times.
When activated, your next Nature spell with a casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.
Reduces the cast time of your next Nature spell by 0.25 secs after being the victim of a critical strike. This effect will stack up to 2 times. Reduces the cast time of your next Nature spell by 0.25 secs after being the victim of a critical strike. This effect will stack up to 3 times. Reduces the cast time of your next Nature spell by 0.25 secs after being the victim of a critical strike. This effect will stack up to 4 times.
Increases spell damage and healing by 2%. Increases spell damage and healing by 4%. Increases spell damage and healing by 6%. Increases spell damage and healing by 8%. Increases spell damage and healing by 10%.
Summons a Mana Tide Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 12 sec that restores 170 mana every 3 seconds to group members within 20 yards.
